titlestmt.titleproper: New York City fire fighters list 1978.032
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Matthew Gorham
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2011-11-17T14:31-0500

did.unittitle: New York City fire fighters list
did.abstract: The exact history of this document is unknown, but it lists the names of fire fighters and fire engineers in New York City, and is dated 1704. The list features 291 names and appears to organize them according to fire company.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); New York City fire fighters list, 1978.032, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Historical Society.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Source and date of acquisition unknown. The item was formally accessioned in 1978.
